author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Another quick partially automatic BuildFile cleaning PR in the style of many before (for example https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29295), this time covering the full Validation subsystem.

The changes mostly stay trivial but for the moving a usage of the `TYPELOOKUP_DATA_REG` macro to the file where it should be used according to [1] (quoting here and I hope I understood it right):
```
 The actual name of the file that uses the 'TYPELOOKUP_DATA_REG' macro is not important.  The only important point
 the file that uses the 'TYPELOOKUP_DATA_REG' macro must be in the same library as the data class it is registering.
```

Doing this correctly, one does not have to declare the library where the macro is actually used as an additional dependency anymore if one wants to use a `edm::ESHandle<TrackerTopology>`, which would look like a fake dependency to this cleaning because it is not required by any `include` statement.

[1] https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/FWCore/Utilities/interface/typelookup.h#L34

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles. It was checked that all newly added dependencies are actually required by the package with `git grep`.
title: Clean BuildFiles in Validation Subsystem
